text: Belsand is a town in the state of Bihar, India. ==Geography== Belsand is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Belsand ==Demographics== India census, Belsand had a population of 20,566. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. 19% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:cities and towns in Sitamarhi district
